channel.title: Swift on Coding With Matt
channel.description: Recent content in Swift on Coding With Matt

item.title: 01 Swift Tour
item.description: A comprehensive tour of Swift fundamentals covering statements, operators as functions, custom types (struct/class/enum), variables vs constants, scope and lifetime, namespaces, and access control with practical examples.

item.title: Variables and Types
item.description: Learn the fundamentals of variables and data types in Swift

item.title: Cat Press
item.description: Create a single-screen app with a button that prints ‘Meow’ to the console when tapped.

item.title: Welcome to Swift Notes
item.description: An introduction to this collection of Swift notes designed to supplement Programming Fundamentals by Matt Nuenberg
